entry.title: Carnival
entry.summary:
Vendor: islandrose.net
Type:
Price: 2550.00

Pink and White Roses and Chrysanthemums

It's a pastel carnival of colours with this enchanting bouquet in pink, white, yellow, green, and orange! Send warmth and kindness wrapped up in a box and let the flowers do the talking.

Flowers are arranged and shipped in exclusive Island Rose packaging. Accessories are not included but have a look at our special add-on gift items that are available upon checkout!

Absolutely no hidden fees! For your convenience, all our prices already include Service Charges, Taxes, and Delivery Fees. Happy Shopping!

*Our priority is to deliver your flowers on time! If certain flowers unexpectedly become unavailable, Island Rose will replace them with flowers of equal or greater value.

**Due to COVID-19, deliveries are limited to Metro Manila and a few provinces. Please refer to our home page and social media or email us for updates.

One Dozen Long Stem Lavender Roses

Enchanting and elegant best describe these lavender roses. This rare flower variety is especially bred for designer brand Davidoff and exclusively grown by selected farms around the world. Someone amazing deserves a bouquet that's equally unique as her. Send this special set of lavender roses today!
